room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Escape Rooms at The Franklin Institute in Philadelphia
review: Get as many people in the room as possible and hope that most of them are young. The 11-year-olds in our group were dynamos.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Escape Rooms at The Franklin Institute in Philadelphia
review: Had a wonderful experience. I had no idea what to expect, but it was great.

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Escape Rooms at The Franklin Institute in Philadelphia
review: Had a blast solving the challenges. Great group exercise and it's fun how everyone brings a different skill set to help accomplish the goal.
